titles.title: Military Personnel Income Tax Exclusion Act
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exclude from the gross income of members of the uniformed services of the United States certain amounts of military basic pay.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 3/19/2009--Introduced. Military Personnel Income Tax Exclusion Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from the gross income of members of the uniformed services for income tax purposes certain military benefits and basic pay.
